text: I'll Tell the World is a 1945 American comedy film directed by Leslie Goodwins and written by Henry Blankfort and Lester Pine. The film stars Lee Tracy, Brenda Joyce, Raymond Walburn, June Preisser, Thomas Gomez and Howard Freeman. The film was released on June 8, 1945, by Universal Pictures. ==Plot== ==Cast== *Lee Tracy as Gabriel Patton *Brenda Joyce as Lorna Gray *Raymond Walburn as H.I. Bailey *June Preisser as Marge Bailey *Thomas Gomez as J.B. Kindell *Howard Freeman as Lester Westchester *Lorin Raker as Perkins *Janet Shaw as Switchboard Operator *Pierre Watkin as Dr. Mullins *Peter Potter as Announcer *Gene Rodgers as Piano Specialty *Jimmie Dean as Jimmie Dean *Jean Aloise as Dance Specialty ==References== ==External links== * Category:1945 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American comedy films Category:1945 comedy films Category:Universal Pictures films Category:Films directed by Leslie Goodwins Category:American black-and-white films
title: I'll Tell the World (1945 film)
